newsitem.title: JAPAN: Square to create software for Namco machines-paper.
newsitem.headline: Square to create software for Namco machines-paper.

text.p: Japanese software firm Square Co Ltd is to develop game software for Namco Ltd's commercial-use game machines, the business daily Nihon Keizai Shimbun reported on Tuesday.
Square's business has been growing rapidly on the success of hit products for home-use game machines, including PlayStation marketed by Sony Corp's Sony Computer Entertainment.
The new game title to be developed by Square for Namco, which may be launched by the end of this year, is expected to employ three-dimensional computer graphic technology, the paper said.
A spokesman for Square was not immediately available to comment on the report.
